News
Doctors disbanded popular myths about cancer.Yesterday 21:00.0
In the early stages, cancer often develops without symptoms, so if a person does not have any pain, it does not guarantee that he has no cancer, warned the oncologist Hamis Magomedov in the first place.conversations
A reversal movement was organized on a federal track in the Locknan districtYesterday 8:00.0
In the federal track A-122, a reverse movement will be organized in the Pskov region.

In connection with the production of works in the area of the village of Bashovo Lokny municipal district, a reversal movement of road traffic with light traffic will be organized on the water pipes from 12 February to 25 March.
Synoptics predict wet snow and Dutchman in Pskov province on 13 FebruaryYesterday 7:00.0
According to pskov synoptics, on 13 February, small snow is expected in the region, with moderate places.

In the south, small rain and snow sludge. There's a holodeck on the roads.

Oriental wind 6-11 m/sec. TemperatureGreat Lukas
Andrei Belyaev gave thanks to the Rosgvardian licensing and extension servicesYesterday 18:00.04 photos
The traditional planetary meeting was held at the Great Luke Administration on 12 February. It started at the award ceremony.

Thanks to the head of the City Administration, the Rosgvardian Licensing Service was awarded. This year the department notes55 years
In the Great Lukas, the first sociocultural design school will be held (16+)Yesterday 5:30.0
On 15 February, the First School of Sociocultural Design will be held in the Great Lukas. NCB Pskov Region, individual entrepreneurs, business associations, municipal institutions, as well as all interested cultural ideas, supported by the Presidential Fund, are invited to participate.initiatives
Two great Luk fraudsters have been sentenced to several years ' imprisonment.Yesterday 5:00.0
According to the Press Service of the West Guinea Interdistrict Court, on 2 August 2023, the former defendant of the 22-year-old genome was interrogated with an unknown person in a letter.Telegram Circ
Several more accidents occurred in Pskov provinceYesterday 4:30.0
Reno ' s driver failed to manage and moved to a higher load, which had previously encountered a school bus. Preliminary data indicate no casualties.

In Ostrov district near villageCircumstances
Michael Wedernikov described the state of the road where a school bus accident occurred.Yesterday 4:00.0
On 12 February, an incident involving a children ' s bus took place near the village of Novgorodka on 379 kilometres of FAD R-23. The 10 high school students of Pustoshkin were on a tour in Pskov. The driver tried to get away from the heavy-duty collision and moved in.Kyvettes
The Pskov Region recorded a decline in the quality of lifeYesterday, 15:30.0
Lider regions are named in quality of life. Upper ranking lines are Moscow, St. Petersburg and Moscow.

Evaluated the regions in 66 indicators, including income levels, employment and labour market, housingconditions
Three children are in reanimation after a school bus and fura crash in Pskov provinceYesterday, 3:00.0
9 children were hospitalized in the Children ' s Regional Clinical Hospital, and three teenagers in a difficult state are in reanimation after the accident that occurred on 12 February near the village of Novgorodka on 379 kilometres of FAD R-23.

10 high school students were on tour.Pskov
No more news,Go back upstairs?
